title: I finally got 0 IP, can I have a cookie, Riot?
body:
https://flic.kr/p/H24yX3

RIP my 53 RP also, can't use them for anything lol.

replies.body: I will treat that IP as my own child.
I have 140k IP... and I can't even buy anything.
I will forever cherish this in my stomach.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KTbvABet,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-23T19:49:07.497+0000)
>
> http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/April_2014/PGD/porobizkit.jpg

Give him 1 RP just to smite him!
